page.title: 05Goudhurst Church Charities.
page.content: The Barton Charity gives about two pounds to thirty old ppeople at Christmas, and at Easter the Dorothy Bathurst Charity gives money to old folk who did not receive any at Christmas. The Goudhurst Educational Foundation is a charity that provides money for school uniforms for three or four children each year. There ia a flat marble-topped tomb inside the church door to the Bathurst family late of Finchcocks, which is known locally as the Bread Tomb because loaves from a bequest are put there on the first and third Sundays for the poor to help themselves. The original order was for 40 loaves but inflation has reduced the sum to 4 small ones today.
